blog.name: sandssavvy
blog.title: Where fandoms collide
blog.description:
I am a giant geek so there will be a lot of fandom posts. However I will also reblog a lot of current events, social justice, etc. I also have some old rp blogs. I am white, dyadic, genderfluid (she or they pronouns), and asexual biromantic. I intend for this blog to be queer positive, trans positive, anti-racism, and intersectionally feminist.

Please let me know if you need any specific trigger warnings if you follow me. I try to trigger warn for any content about rape with "rape culture", "rape", or "tw:rape" also I tag "gifs" or "Gif set" for anyone with epilepsy

My Archive of Our Own fanfic page.

My youtube account

It is mainly full of Critical Role compilation vids and cosplay vids.

and my Ko-fi is here.

In case you would like to support me.

Tumblr posts of my vids are here

summary: The team gives their little bird daughter a new family and a safe home. (Not a moment too soon.) Pretty sure Caleb’s “Oh no”...
caption:
The team gives their little bird daughter a new family and a safe home. (Not a moment too soon.)
Pretty sure Caleb’s “Oh no” during the hug was him struggling not to cry.
It’s too bad that Laura and Travis didn’t get to say goodbye to Kiri. Nice that it was because they were having their child, though.

Footage from Critical Role Campaign 2 Episode 25: “Divergent Paths”

Subscribe if you want to see more of my Critical Role compilation vids as they are released.

blog.name: caleb-widogastt
blog.title: Tired, Bi, and Ready To Cry (and/or) Die
blog.description: I'm really bad at updating this, but (so I don't have to for the next 7 years) Late 20s/early 30s Man, if that makes you Uncomfortable, please, I don't mind if you unfollow/block. Come for the Critical Role and other fandom stuff...stay for (not so vague) leftist/socialist propoganda, sadness, and shitty memes.

summary: Sudden, pretty great realization
title: Sudden, pretty great realization
body: So, on Talks Machina occasionally when talking about how “we don’t really know these characters yet” the cast relate the episode # to Campaign 1. Like, for example, for episode 20 they’d say things like “we’re only one fifth of the way through the campaign! But, I think they’re underestimating. Going back to Campaign 1, Episode 1: Arrival at Kraghammer, Vox Machina was somewhere between level’s five and seven by my estimation (they had to be at least level five because Percy and Vex both have two attacks). The Nein are only now at level five, 25ish episodes in. So, using Vox Machina’s campaign as a point of reference, there’s a very good chance that there’s going to be 115-120 episodes from here.

Going back to Campaign 1, Episode 1: Arrival at Kraghammer, Vox Machina was somewhere between level’s five and seven by my estimation (they had to be at least level five because Percy and Vex both have two attacks). The Nein are only now at level five, 25ish episodes in. So, using Vox Machina’s campaign as a point of reference, there’s a very good chance that there’s going to be 115-120 episodes from here.

blog.name: critrolestats
blog.title: CritRoleStats
blog.description: Critter blog keeping track of monster stats, dice rolls, and anything else that can be quantified on Critical Role.

summary: Media References and Puns of 2-25 Divergent Paths
title: Media References and Puns of 2-25 Divergent Paths
body:
Two paths diverged on the Crispvale Road,
Molly, Caleb, Nott, and Beau were still
Sleeping there; the others, like a load–
Though quite a fight against they had showed–
Were taken away against their will.

Media References

  • (0:00:08) Sam is wearing a Smokey and the Bandit costume from Campaign 1, Ep30.
  • (0:02:39) Sam: I composed a song for you in the style of your favorite band, Boyz II Men. *singing* How do I… (“It’s So Hard to Say Goodbye” by Boyz II Men)
  • (0:04:33) Taliesin: I can never remember: Is the monkey Smokey or the Bandit?
  • (0:05:41) Matt: We just launched a Kickstarter with our good friends at Steamforged Games.
  • (0:17:23) Marisha: Lord of the Rings-style.
  • (0:17:34) Marisha: And then huge canons! Pirates! (Pirates of the Caribbean)
  • (0:17:48) Taliesin: …an evil Willy Wonka kind of thing.
  • (0:21:31) Taliesin: Vampire Hunters.  Matt: It is covered in Daywalkers, yes.
  • (0:24:48) Sam: But like Orkin man outfits?
  • (0:34:20) Matt: There is a core … it’s supposed to power for about 200 years before it needs replacing. Marisha: Ooh, a Duracell.
  • (0:36:24) Taliesin: Is there a front and a back to this thing, or is it just a whirling dervish?
  • (0:46:10) Liam: Fetch the gimp. (Pulp Fiction)
  • (0:46:22) Matt: He’s basically Bill Murray in What About Bob? at this point.

Read More

blog.name: nilim
blog.title: The sky may be falling, but the stars look good on you
blog.description:
D&D, Critical Role, Discworld. 
-
I create meta, gifsets, fanart and fanfiction.

My inbox is always open for prompts, and I love getting them... but no guarantees.

summary: No episode this week 🙃

Fjord: Jester kissed me!
Caleb: [Gasps] No!
Molly: Oh my gods, oh my gods, oh my gods!
Fjord: It was unbelievable
Caleb: Oh my...
body:
Fjord: Jester kissed me!
Caleb: [Gasps] No!
Molly: Oh my gods, oh my gods, oh my gods!
Fjord: It was unbelievable
Caleb: Oh my gods, oh my gods, oh my gods.
Molly: Okay, okay, we want to hear everything. Caleb, get the wine and unplug the phone. Fjord, does this end well or do we need tissues?
Fjord: Oh, it ended verrrrry well
Caleb: [Rushing over with wine glasses] Do not start without me! Do not start without me!
Molly: Alright, let’s hear about the kiss. Was it like a, soft brush against your lips, or was it like a, y'know, “I got to have you know” kind of thing?
Fjord: Well, at first it was really intense, y'know, and then… Oh god, and then we just sort of sunk into it…
Caleb and Molly: Awwwwww!
[Meanwhile]
Jester: And, uh, and then I kissed him.
Beau: Tongue?
Jester: Yeah.
Beau: Cool.

dialogue.name: Molly
dialogue.label: Molly:
dialogue.phrase: Oh my gods, oh my gods, oh my gods!

dialogue.name: Caleb
dialogue.label: Caleb:
dialogue.phrase: Oh my gods, oh my gods, oh my gods.

dialogue.name: Molly
dialogue.label: Molly:
dialogue.phrase: Okay, okay, we want to hear everything. Caleb, get the wine and unplug the phone. Fjord, does this end well or do we need tissues?

dialogue.name: Caleb
dialogue.label: Caleb:
dialogue.phrase: [Rushing over with wine glasses] Do not start without me! Do not start without me!

dialogue.name: Molly
dialogue.label: Molly:
dialogue.phrase: Alright, let’s hear about the kiss. Was it like a, soft brush against your lips, or was it like a, y'know, “I got to have you know” kind of thing?

dialogue.name: Fjord
dialogue.label: Fjord:
dialogue.phrase: Well, at first it was really intense, y'know, and then… Oh god, and then we just sort of sunk into it…

dialogue.name: Jester
dialogue.label: Jester:
dialogue.phrase: And, uh, and then I kissed him.

summary: “no. cassandra is a de rolo. and you took them from me.”  a playlist for the guardian of woven stone. tracklist below the...
caption:
“no. cassandra is a de rolo. and you took them from me.”

a playlist for the guardian of woven stone.

tracklist below the cut. 

once upon a december // emile pandolfi

instrumental

blinding // florence + the machine

no kiss, no gentle word / could wake me from my slumber / until i realized / that it was you who held me under

run boy run // woodkid

run boy run! this ride is a journey to / run boy run! the secret inside of you

wolf mother // the mynabirds

yeah, i wanna know / that man in sheepskin / ‘cause i owe him a fight

cherry tree // the national

don’t look at me / i’m only breathing / don’t look at me, i’m indiscreet

remembrance // balmorhea

instrumental

2-1 // imogen heap

i’m dying to know / to help make some sense of it all / i’m dying to know / tell me is it my fault?

fondu au noir // coeur de pirate

dors, le mal est passé, il te rattrapera pas / le souffle coupé, tu n’es plus son appât

life in her yet // rag’n’bone man

time will take us all, and turn us into stones / it leaves us with regret, it picks apart the threads / hung over fragile bones

wasting my young years // london grammar

don’t you know that it’s all i feel / i wouldn’t worry, you have all the love / i’ve heard it takes some time to get it right 

ghosts // james vincent mcmorrow

and a bird without its wings / is a low and tragic thing

your bones // of monsters and men

in the spring we made a boat / out of feathers, out of bones / we set fire to our homes / walking barefoot in the snow

dear wormwood // the oh hellos

i know who i am now / i know who i want to be / i want to be more than this devil inside of me

up the wolves // the mountain goats

there’s going to come a day when you feel better / you’ll rise up free and easy on that day / and float from branch to branch, lighter than the air / just when that day is coming, who can say, who can say?
caption_abstract:
“no. cassandra is a de rolo. and you took them from me.”

a playlist for the guardian of woven stone.

tracklist below the cut.

blinding // florence + the machine

no kiss, no gentle word / could wake me from my slumber / until i realized / that it was you who held me under

run boy run // woodkid

run boy run! this ride is a journey to / run boy run! the secret inside of you

wolf mother // the mynabirds

yeah, i wanna know / that man in sheepskin / ‘cause i owe him a fight

cherry tree // the national

don’t look at me / i’m only breathing / don’t look at me, i’m indiscreet

remembrance // balmorhea

instrumental

2-1 // imogen heap

i’m dying to know / to help make some sense of it all / i’m dying to know / tell me is it my fault?

fondu au noir // coeur de pirate

dors, le mal est passé, il te rattrapera pas / le souffle coupé, tu n’es plus son appât

life in her yet // rag’n’bone man

time will take us all, and turn us into stones / it leaves us with regret, it picks apart the threads / hung over fragile bones

wasting my young years // london grammar

don’t you know that it’s all i feel / i wouldn’t worry, you have all the love / i’ve heard it takes some time to get it right 

ghosts // james vincent mcmorrow

and a bird without its wings / is a low and tragic thing

your bones // of monsters and men

in the spring we made a boat / out of feathers, out of bones / we set fire to our homes / walking barefoot in the snow

dear wormwood // the oh hellos

i know who i am now / i know who i want to be / i want to be more than this devil inside of me

up the wolves // the mountain goats

there’s going to come a day when you feel better / you’ll rise up free and easy on that day / and float from branch to branch, lighter than the air / just when that day is coming, who can say, who can say?
trail.content_abstract:
“no. cassandra is a de rolo. and you took them from me.”

a playlist for the guardian of woven stone.

tracklist below the cut.

blog.name: istezada
blog.title: Occasional Whatsits
blog.description: The author has no idea what she's doing, but she's been told that few people know what they're doing.  She tries to find this comforting.

summary: Scuse. Can we just talk about how terrifyingly blank Taliesin’s face was at the end of Episode 25, while Matt described Yasha...
body:
Scuse.

Can we just talk about how terrifyingly blank Taliesin’s face was at the end of Episode 25, while Matt described Yasha (and Jester and Fjord) being [redacted]? The only thing that showed through was the barest sign amused contempt, glinting with that unique razor-edge that speaks of icily controlled fury. I am really looking forward to Mollymauk’s reaction when he finds out, don’t get me wrong, but…

Do not fuck with the people who have been claimed by the Faery Pyramid, y’all. Just don’t.

blog.name: sandssavvy
blog.title: Where fandoms collide
blog.description:
I am a giant geek so there will be a lot of fandom posts. However I will also reblog a lot of current events, social justice, etc. I also have some old rp blogs. I am white, dyadic, genderfluid (she or they pronouns), and asexual biromantic. I intend for this blog to be queer positive, trans positive, anti-racism, and intersectionally feminist.

Please let me know if you need any specific trigger warnings if you follow me. I try to trigger warn for any content about rape with "rape culture", "rape", or "tw:rape" also I tag "gifs" or "Gif set" for anyone with epilepsy

My Archive of Our Own fanfic page.

My youtube account

It is mainly full of Critical Role compilation vids and cosplay vids.

and my Ko-fi is here.

In case you would like to support me.

Tumblr posts of my vids are here

summary: Beau and Caleb make a pact to keep each other good, and a new team alliance is formed. Liam continues to accidentally make very...
caption:
Beau and Caleb make a pact to keep each other good, and a new team alliance is formed.
Liam continues to accidentally make very misleading statements.
In Liam’s skype room (which has transformed him into a James Bond villain) everything Caleb says becomes 10 x more ominous.

Footage from Critical Role Campaign 2 Episode 25: “Divergent Paths”

Subscribe if you want to see more of my Critical Role compilation vids as they are released.

summary: Once we get through tonight with no episode of Talks Machina, we just have to get through Thursday without the usual Critical...
body: Once we get through tonight with no episode of Talks Machina, we just have to get through Thursday without the usual Critical Role episode and then back to normal waiting time for everything. Still we will be down some players but I am TRYING to look on the bright side and it is less than a month til GenCon so *forced optimism in the face of CR withdrawal*
